neovoxy.config.title: NeoVoxy
neovoxy.config.general.serviceThreads.to: Number of threads the ServiceThreadPool can use
neovoxy.config.general.useEmbeddiumBuild: Uses Embeddium builder threads as part of NeoVoxy's thread pool, can reduce stuttering and lag when moving quickly at high render distance
neovoxy.config.general.ingest.tooltip: Enables or disables NeoVoxy's ability to convert new chunks into LoDs
neovoxy.config.general.subDivisionSize.t: Maximum size in pixels (squared) of screenspace AABB before subdiving to smaller LoDs (Smaller being higher quality)
neovoxy.config.general.renderDistance.to: Render distance of NeoVoxy in sections
neovoxy.config.general.environmental_fog: Enables or disables NeoVoxy rendering environmental fog
neovoxy.config.general.render_fog.toolti: Enables or disables render fog effect
neovoxy.config.general.render_statistics: Enable render statistics in F3 menu, useful for debugging
